Filter function. Filters the data by weekdays. The dataset can e.g. be filtered by all days between monday and friday. The dataset needs an ordered factor variable named 'weekday'.

Source: R/helpers_timestamp.R
filter_weekday.Rd

Filter function. Filters the data by weekdays. The dataset can e.g. be filtered by all days between monday and friday. The dataset needs an ordered factor variable named 'weekday'.

filter_weekday(data, from_day = "Mon", from_time = "00:00:00",
  until_day = "Sun", until_time = "23:59:59")

Arguments

data

dataframe.
from_day

character. Day of the week where filtering should start. Please check the machines locale for correct usage. Defaults to "Mon".
from_time

character. Time where filtering should start (on the day from_day). Must be a string with the format "hh:mm:ss". Defaults to "00:00:00".
until_day

character. Day of the week where filtering should end. Please check the machines locale for correct usage. Defaults to "Sun".
until_time

character. Time where filtering should end (on the day until_day). Must be a string with the format "hh:mm:ss". Defaults to "23:59:59".

Value

filtered dataframe by weekday and time.

See also

Other filter functions: filter_daytime

Contents

  • Value
